title: Hanayo-chan’s Season
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Look, look, Hanayo-chan! The cherry blossom buds have gotten so big!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Wow, you’re right~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s going to be Hanayo-chan’s season now, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hanayo’s radiance and warmth are what make the flowers bloom. Ruby thinks that would make it Hanayo-chan’s season~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehh!? M-My season? That’s not true!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>To Ruby, it is. Hey, when the cherry blossoms bloom, let’s go flower viewing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I want to go flower viewing too! I’ll make lots of onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Then Ruby will make lots of side dishes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, I’m looking forward to it. I hope they bloom quickly~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
